name: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers (Slow Cooker)
description: These quinoa stuffed bell peppers are one of my favorite weeknight meals! They're super delicious and incredibly healthy. And the best thing is that they're made in the slow cooker and the recipe couldn't be any easier.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup cooked black beans or kidney beans

recipeInstructions.text: Cut off the tops of green peppers; discard seeds and membranes. In a large bowl, combine the rest of the ingredients. Evenly divide the quinoa bean mixture into the bell peppers.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut off the tops of green peppers; discard seeds and membranes. In a large bowl, combine the rest of the ingredients. Evenly divide the quinoa bean mixture into the bell peppers.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill some water (about 3/4 cup) in your slow cooker. Then put the filled bell peppers in the slow cooker. Cook for 3 hours on high or 6 hours on low.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill some water (about 3/4 cup) in your slow cooker. Then put the filled bell peppers in the slow cooker. Cook for 3 hours on high or 6 hours on low.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the quinoa stuffed peppers with some green onions, guacamole, fresh lime juice, and cilantro or parsley on top. They're also great with salsa!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the quinoa stuffed peppers with some green onions, guacamole, fresh lime juice, and cilantro or parsley on top. They're also great with salsa!
